text:
monitoring.
• If the antenatal CTG has 2 accelerations in 20 min (acceleration of baseline fetal heart rate of 15 bpm for >15
seconds), this is reassuring, and if all the other aspects are normal, the CTG is classified as normal, indicating
that the fetus is almost certainly well.
• If there are no accelerations after 40 minutes, try changing the maternal position or administer acoustic
stimulation. Continued absence should prompt referral for a further, more detailed assessment - including of
